page_content:
59“This year we hit 100,000 miles with 
Panther! We drive a Freightliner 
Cascadia 2016 — her name is La 
Vergne, and we love her! One of the 
best memories we have over the road 
will always be when we first bought our 
own truck, and we could drive it off the 
lot. It was a really happy day and a huge 
sense of pride for both of us. We love 
the freedom of owning our own truck.” 
David and Amy Salinas, Texas
Panther Premium Logistics 
Driver Stories
